Name: Squarelands
About the game: Squarelands is sandbox adventure game where you explore a randomly generated world while fighting, building and becoming stronger as you play! Mainly inspired by Terraria, Squarelands aims to provide plenty of freedom for the player. Features: Day/Night Cycles Mining, Crafting and Building Procedural Map Generation Fishing and Farming Hundreds of Items and Objects Death Penalties (and Optional Permadeath) Key Rebinding
